thread.title: European Deal Making Steamrolls Ahead

author: Ben Dummett
title: European Deal Making Steamrolls Ahead
text:
European deal making hit an 11-year high for the first quarter and shows no sign of slowing, even as the threat of a possible China-U.S. trade war and pressure on global technology stocks hang over equity markets.
Heading into 2018, conditions were ripe for mergers and acquisitions: European stocks finished higher last year, the regionâ€™s economy grew at its fastest rate in a decade, borrowing costs remained low, and shareholder activism was on the rise to push for corporate restructuring.
...
